summary: A chimney sweep and a shepherdess seek to escape from the clutches of a tyrannical king.
cast: Jean Martin|Pascal Mazzotti|Raymond Bussières|Agnès Viala|Renaud Marx|Hubert Deschamps|Roger Blin|Philippe Derrez|Albert Médina|Claude Piéplu|Lionel Charpy|Jacques Colombat|Robert Lombard|Jean Mermet|Vincent Montrobert|Popeck|Pierre Risch|Bruno Sermonne|Jean Vimenet|Jeanne Witta
title: Le roi et l'oiseau
